text: The speedups probably won't come from 1.6, but rather through multithreading in grouping and combining

text: <@U6QGE7S86> We also improved single-threaded join and grouping performance. Expect better benchmarks in 1.0.

text: Do h2oai benchmarks compare reading formats in CSV and Arrow? It seems like Polars is using Arrow under the hood all the time, and not parsing CSVs

elements.text: Do h2oai benchmarks compare reading formats in CSV and Arrow? It seems like Polars is using Arrow under the hood all the time, and not parsing CSVs

text:
no, this is all once the data is read in.

I'm not sure what format the data is in originally, though, but i dont think it would affect poler's performance.
